articles.author: Nick Lichtenberg
articles.title: Analyst who called the dot-com bubble says Americans are turning a deaf ear to AI warnings—and a worse meltdown than 2008 looms - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: "Generally, when you're gripped by a bubble, people just don't want to listen because they're making so much money," warns Albert Edwards.
articles.content: Albert Edwards, the outspoken Global Strategist at Société Généralea figure who even refers to himself as a perma bearis certain that the current U.S. equity market, driven largely by high-flying tec… [+11958 chars]
